text: Preload Full: Treat as in aortic stenosis Afterload Increase: Treat hypotension aggressively with | a-adrenergic agonists Contractility ~ Prefer depression Rate Normal range; B-blockers decrease LVOT gradient and increase LV end-diastolic pressure Rhythm Sinus rhythm is crucial: Atrial pacing modalities (PAC, esophageal) may be helpful MVO, Not a problem CPB Start with volume and vasoconstrictors; avoid inotropes. Check carefully for residual gradient and SAM; rule out ventricular septal defect
